page.title: 18Our Homes
page.content: Our typical{homes}are detached and semi-detached houses,and flats.Most of our homes have about 500 square metres of garden,with a garage and a shed of some sort.The most common materials used to build our houses are bricks,tiles,glass,wood,cement and various metals.Nearly all our houses have drains,water and electricity supplies,and many have gas and telephone.Most houses have{gardens with fences or hedges around,but some are open gardens,especially at the front.Many homes are very well insulated since heating costs have risen,and have doubleglazing, fibreglass loft insulation,and some have cavity wall insulation.Most homes have central heating in some way and fitted carpets.They have comfortable furnishings and many electrical and electronic appliances.
